name: Luboh
description: The Products and Services Social Web
overview:
Social media for products and services.

Luboh beta is team of cool people who got together to solve the needs of products and services for people in everyday life. Luboh’s mission is to empower people through social networking to get the best experience of products and services and to share anonymously with the World and also with friends.

It allows to save time, money and effort. It allows to determine which product or service is good for one’s need, what price is best and from where it can be acquired.
